# ğŸš€ HyperCode: Programming Language for All Minds ``` â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ğŸ§  HyperCode: Code Like Your Brain Works ğŸ§  â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ Resurrecting Forgotten Genius. Building the Future. â•‘ â•‘ Making Programming Accessible to EVERYONE â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• ``` [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) [![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/build-passing-brightgreen)](https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode/actions) [![Code Coverage](https://img.shields.io/badge/coverage-85%25-brightgreen)](https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode) [![Contributors](https://img.shields.io/badge/contributors-open%20for%20all-blueviolet)](CONTRIBUTING.md) [![Status: Active Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-active%20development-blue)](https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode) --- ## ğŸ¯ What is HyperCode? **HyperCode is not just another programming language.** It's a revolutionary movement to reimagine how _all_ mindsâ€”especially neurodivergent onesâ€”interact with code, logic, and intelligent systems. ### The Core Vision Programming languages are more than syntax. **They are an expression of _how_ minds think.** - For neurodivergent coders, typical languages often don't fit brain patterns. - For AI-powered code, static language design is outdated. - Forgotten languages carry experimental truths that mainstream missed. - Making programming accessible isn't optionalâ€”**it's essential for innovation.** --- ## ğŸ”¥ Why HyperCode? ### âœ¨ Built for Neurodivergent Thinkers HyperCode prioritizes **spatial logic**, **minimal noise**, and **accessible visuals**. It's designed to work _with_ how dyslexic, ADHD, and autistic brains naturally operateâ€”not against them. ### ğŸ§¬ Resurrecting Forgotten Genius We draw inspiration from radical, experimental languages like **PlankalkÃ¼l**, **Brainfuck**, and **Befunge**â€”languages that broke rules to open new possibilities. HyperCode integrates their creative power into the modern era. ### ğŸ¤– Universal AI Compatibility HyperCode works seamlessly with **GPT**, **Claude**, **Mistral**, **Ollama**, and custom AI modelsâ€”without costly rewrites. One codebase, unlimited AI power. ### ğŸ“Š Living Research Digital Paper This isn't static. HyperCode **auto-updates daily** powered by AI research agents and knowledge graphs. It evolves with the latest breakthroughs in AI, quantum computing, DNA coding, and neurodiversity-focused design. ### ğŸŒ Open, Collaborative, Professional Built with real-world DevOps, CI/CD, automated quality checks, and versioning from day one. **Industry-grade. Community-driven. Ready for the world.** --- ## ğŸš€ Quick Start ### Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode.git cd HyperCode # Install dependencies npm install # Run the first example node examples/hello-world.hc ``` ### Your First HyperCode Program ```hypercode THINK "Hello, Beautiful Brain!" FLOW [ PAINT "Welcome to HyperCode" LOOP 3 => ECHO "You belong here" ] ``` Compare to traditional code: ```javascript console.log('Hello, Beautiful Brain!'); for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) { console.log('You belong here'); } ``` **See the difference?** HyperCode reads like poetry. It removes cognitive load. It _thinks_ with you. --- ## ğŸ“š Documentation - **[Getting Started Guide](./docs/getting-started.md)** â€” Your first steps with HyperCode - **[Language Reference](./docs/language-reference.md)** â€” Complete syntax guide - **[Neurodivergent-Friendly Design](./docs/neurodivergent-design.md)** â€” How HyperCode prioritizes accessibility - **[AI Integration Guide](./docs/ai-integration.md)** â€” Connect with GPT, Claude, and more - **[Contributing Guide](./CONTRIBUTING.md)** â€” Join the movement - **[Roadmap](./ROADMAP.md)** â€” What's coming next --- ## ğŸ’¡ Core Features | Feature | Description | | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | | **Spatial Syntax** | Visual, pattern-based code flow instead of dense text | | **Minimal Noise** | No unnecessary symbols or complexityâ€”just clarity | | **AI-Native** | Built to collaborate with intelligent systems from day one | | **Esoteric Roots** | Inspired by forgotten languages, radical ideas enabled | | **Accessible** | Designed for all minds, with dyslexia-friendly fonts and accessible docs | | **Open Source** | Community-driven, transparent, professional-grade | | **Living Docs** | Auto-updated research, never stale | --- ## ğŸ“ Learn by Example ### Spatial Logic (Easy on Dyslexic Brains) ```hypercode BLUEPRINT Circle { CORE => radius: number METHOD draw => PAINT "â—" } ``` ### AI Collaboration ```hypercode THINK-WITH ChatGPT [ ASK "Generate a sorting algorithm" CAPTURE response => algorithm EXECUTE algorithm ] ``` ### Data Flow (Visual & Clear) ```hypercode FLOW [ FETCH data FILTER data => results TRANSFORM results SHOW results ] ``` --- ## ğŸŒ The HyperCode Community HyperCode is for **everyone**â€”especially those historically excluded from tech: - Neurodivergent developers (ADHD, autism, dyslexia, dysgraphia) - Underrepresented groups in programming - Accessibility advocates - AI researchers and enthusiasts - Esoteric language enthusiasts - Anyone who believes code should be _beautiful_ **You belong here.** No gatekeeping. No judgment. Just collaboration. --- ## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack - **Language**: JavaScript/TypeScript (for universal compatibility) - **Parser**: Custom AST-based lexer and parser - **AI Integration**: REST/WebSocket APIs for all major AI platforms - **Testing**: Jest + Cypress for full coverage - **DevOps**: GitHub Actions, Docker, automated deployments - **Documentation**: Markdown + Accessibility-first design --- ## ğŸ“Š Project Status - âœ… **Phase 1 (Current)**: Core language design, neurodivergent-first principles - ğŸ”„ **Phase 2 (Upcoming)**: AI integration, full test suite, documentation - ğŸš€ **Phase 3**: Community governance, package ecosystem, production readiness - ğŸŒŸ **Phase 4**: Quantum computing support, DNA code, living research integration **Check the [Roadmap](./ROADMAP.md) for detailed timelines.** --- ## ğŸ¤ Contributing We're open to contributions from **all skill levels and backgrounds**. Whether you're a seasoned developer or picking up your first language: - **Code contributions**: Submit PRs to [improve HyperCode](./CONTRIBUTING.md) - **Documentation**: Help us write clear, accessible guides - **Design feedback**: Tell us how HyperCode fits (or doesn't) your brain - **Ideas & discussions**: Open issues to propose features or discuss vision **[Read our Contributing Guide](./CONTRIBUTING.md) to get started.** --- ## ğŸ“– Inspiration & History HyperCode doesn't exist in a vacuum. We draw inspiration from: - **PlankalkÃ¼l** â€” The first high-level programming language (1940s) - **Brainfuck** â€” Minimal, pure logic, maximum creativity - **Befunge** â€” Spatial, 2D code flow - **Lisp** â€” S-expressions, functional beauty - **APL** â€” Mathematical elegance and density - **Scratch** â€” Visual programming for all ages - **Modern Neurodivergent Research** â€” Brain-first design principles [Learn more in our research archive.](./docs/research-history.md) --- ## ğŸ“ License HyperCode is released under the **MIT License**. See [LICENSE](./LICENSE) for details. --- ## ğŸ™Œ The Manifesto > **Programming languages are more than syntax. They are an expression of _how_ minds > think.** > > For neurodivergent coders, typical languages often don't fit. For AI-powered code, > static design is outdated. Forgotten languages carry experimental truths. Making > programming accessible is essential for innovation. > > **HyperCode is the answer. Join us.** --- ## ğŸŒŸ Featured In - Coming soon! Help us get featured by starring â­ and contributing. --- ## ğŸ’¬ Get Involved - **Discussions**: [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode/discussions) - **Report Bugs**: [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode/issues) - **Chat with Us**: [Discord Community](https://discord.gg/hypercode) (coming soon) --- ## ğŸ“ Questions? Check our **[FAQ](./docs/FAQ.md)** or open a discussion. **No question is too small.** ---
### ğŸ”¥ Ready to Code Like Your Brain Works? **â­ Star this repo if HyperCode resonates with you** **[Get Started Now](./docs/getting-started.md)** | **[View Roadmap](./ROADMAP.md)** | **[Contribute](./CONTRIBUTING.md)** --- _Built with ğŸ’“ for neurodivergent minds and the future of AI-human collaboration._ **HyperCode: Where forgotten genius meets the future. ğŸš€**
